CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: SharePoint Pages API
CurrentVersion.description:
,
New graph API to create and manage SharePoint pages and news posts.  Correcting the status to "In Development as only a preview is available at this time.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Graph: SharePoint Pages API
OldVersion.description: ,New graph API to create and manage SharePoint pages and news posts.  Correcting the status to "In Development as only a preview is available at this time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Answers in Communities
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Answers for Viva Engage communities: premium license holders can see 'Top related questions' in the question publisher, gain badges for answering questions in communities, and view their activity through Answers Analytics.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Answers in Communities
OldVersion.description: Introducing Answers for Viva Engage communities: premium license holders can see 'Top related questions' in the question publisher, gain badges for answering questions in communities, and view their activity through Answers Analytics.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights delegate access for leaders
CurrentVersion.description: New delegate access allows leaders to empower other individuals to view insights about their organization. Those with delegated access will be able to easily navigate to the leader's view of organizational insights.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights delegate access for leaders
OldVersion.description: New delegate access allows leaders to empower other individuals to view insights about their organization. Those with delegated access will be able to easily navigate to the leader's view of organizational insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365)
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for Microsoft 365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities that help with security and compliance of data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365)
CurrentVersion.description: We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to follow.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365
OldVersion.description: We will be introducing a new Usage report covering Copilot for Microsoft 365. The report will include two sections: readiness and usage. The readiness section will include insights into your organization's technical eligibility, license assignment, and Microsoft 365 usage metrics to inform Copilot license assignment decisions. The Usage section of the report will include total enabled and active users, Copilot usage with a breakout per Microsoft 365 app, activity insights, and more to follow.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most to them.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your activity notifications from the activity card
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to control what shows in their activity feed by clicking on the ellipsis from the activity card, helping them to stay on top of the information that matters most to them.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
OldVersion.description:
,
Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Prevent user from sharing content in externally hosted meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: If a user attends a meeting hosted by an external tenant, the IT admin of the person attending the externally hosted meeting can decide in which externally hosted meetings the user can share their content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot in Forms empowers you to create and customize forms with ease and speed
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms is a new feature that enables users to create forms and customize themes with ease and speed. With this feature, you can describe the form you need in natural language, and Copilot will generate a form based on your description. You can preview the form and refine it as needed. After that, you can get suggested themes to uplift your form that encourages more engagement from the audience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Copilot in Forms empowers you to create and customize forms with ease and speed
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Forms is a new feature that enables users to create forms and customize themes with ease and speed. With this feature, you can describe the form you need in natural language, and Copilot will generate a form based on your description. You can preview the form and refine it as needed. After that, you can get suggested themes to uplift your form that encourages more engagement from the audience.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. This will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up to date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon. #newoutlookforwindows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
OldVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web. This will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up to date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon. #newoutlookforwindows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: OneDrive – Share Word Documents with AI summary
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now opt to include an AI-generated document summary inside the share dialog when they share a Word document with other users. The document summary is included in the share notification email sent to the recipient(s) giving them more context around the contents of the shared document. This feature is only enabled for customers with a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and works only when sharing a Word for the web file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: OneDrive – Share Word Documents with AI summary
OldVersion.description: Users can now opt to include an AI-generated document summary inside the share dialog when they share a Word document with other users. The document summary is included in the share notification email sent to the recipient(s) giving them more context around the contents of the shared document. This feature is only enabled for customers with a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and works only when sharing a Word for the web file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Automatic profile switching controls for Microsoft Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description: ,The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with the ability to configure settings for automatic profile switching in the Microsoft Edge browser. This can help enforce context separation between their end users' work and personal browsing.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Automatic profile switching controls for Microsoft Edge for Business
OldVersion.description: ,The Microsoft Edge management service will provide admins with the ability to configure settings for automatic profile switching in the Microsoft Edge browser. This can help enforce context separation between their end users' work and personal browsing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Admins and delegates in Viva Engage con close conversations on behalf of others
CurrentVersion.description: Admins and delegates in Viva Engage con close conversations on behalf of others. Delegates are only allowed to close conversations on behalf of the delegator.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Admins and delegates in Viva Engage con close conversations on behalf of others
OldVersion.description: Admins and delegates in Viva Engage con close conversations on behalf of others. Delegates are only allowed to close conversations on behalf of the delegator.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Data residency commitments
CurrentVersion.description: New commitments covering stored content of interactions with Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 will be added to existing data residency commitments for Microsoft 365. The commitments will be available for worldwide standard multi-tenant customers through Microsoft Product Terms and data residency product offerings, including the Advanced Data Residency (“ADR”) and Multi-Geo Capabilities add-ons.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Data residency commitments
OldVersion.description: New commitments covering stored content of interactions with Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 will be added to existing data residency commitments for Microsoft 365. The commitments will be available for worldwide standard multi-tenant customers through Microsoft Product Terms and data residency product offerings, including the Advanced Data Residency (“ADR”) and Multi-Geo Capabilities add-ons.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: The new Microsoft Purview Portal entering GA
CurrentVersion.description: The new Microsoft Purview portal has a streamlined design and unified experience that helps you discover and access data security, data governance, and risk and compliance solutions for all your data, wherever it lives across your data estate. This means you can now access all Purview solutions in one single portal, as well as experiences such as settings, global search, recommendations, and roles and permissions management.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
OldVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Interact with Copilot in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Interact with Copilot in Outlook, ask questions, or provide instructions directly inside Outlook. Users can type and receive responses from Copilot in a right-hand side panel that can be opened by the user by clicking on the Copilot icon in the top nav bar. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365: Interact with Copilot in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description: Interact with Copilot in Outlook, ask questions, or provide instructions directly inside Outlook. Users can type and receive responses from Copilot in a right-hand side panel that can be opened by the user by clicking on the Copilot icon in the top nav bar. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Change history reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Change history reports
OldVersion.description: Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage spotlight settings in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Elevate your Connections experience with more control over what appears in the spotlight section. Operators will have the ability to pin items, including hyperlinks from any source, onto the spotlight section and select SharePoint sites as additional content sources to dynamically populate the spotlight section.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Zoom meetings with an ID and passcode from a Teams room on Android
CurrentVersion.description:
Teams Rooms on Android can now join Zoom meetings with an ID and a passcode. This feature is only available with the Teams Rooms Pro license and your room must be configured to enable Direct Guest Join meetings. Learn about how to enable Teams Rooms devices to join third-party meetings at the link below.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoftteams/rooms/third-party-join

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: ,In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
OldVersion.description: In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Exfiltration of business-sensitive data to free public domain emails
CurrentVersion.description:
,In this update, we are enhancing the existing email insight alerts to provide additional information when business-sensitive data is potentially leaked from a work email account to a free public domain email, potentially leading to a data security incident. The new domain detection group "Free public domains" will list the common domains used for personal email accounts. Admins with appropriate permissions can choose to select these domains in their indicator variants.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Shortcuts to copy and paste emails (Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V) in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to copy and paste emails in Outlook using the shortcuts Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V, allowing them to quickly transfer emails to the desired folder, streamlining workflow, and enhancing productivity. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Analyze linked content from OneDrive and SharePoint Online – chats and private channels
CurrentVersion.description:
This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate, it will be replaced with a new item if still relevant. Communication Compliance policies that detect violations in Microsoft Teams will now analyze the content of documents shared in chats and private channels for potential policy match. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-channels?view=o365-worldwide#microsoft-teams

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Analyze linked content from OneDrive and SharePoint Online – chats and private channels
OldVersion.description:
Communication Compliance policies that detect violations in Microsoft Teams will now analyze the content of documents shared in chats and private channels for potential policy match. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance-channels?view=o365-worldwide#microsoft-teams
